alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Southwest Mountains; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 1:42PM MST until January 04 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands, Northwest Highlands, Chuska Mountains, Northwest Plateau, Southwest Mountains, and West Central Highlands. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes Interstate 40 near Grants. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow may significantly reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Southwest Mountains; West Central Highlands
